traits.name: Earth Glide
entries: The totem elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the totem elemental doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

traits.name: Siege Monster
entries: The totem elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The totem elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage.
